team.name: Name
team.pureTrainingTeamExplanation: When activated as pure training team, the team will not be listed in the overview. Although it remains visible in the team selection.
team.officialExplanation: Training rooms can be used by anyone even without an official project/product team. Please mark them, then an "official" badge will be displayed.

team.pureTrainingTeamExplanation: When activated as pure training person, the person will not be listed in the overview. Although it remains visible in the person selection.
team.officialExplanation: Training rooms can be used by anyone even without an official project/product. Please mark them, then an "official" badge will be displayed.
